question: Vaan Island, sometimes seen in the news, is located in _?
explanation: Vaan Island of Tuticorin region is one of the 21 uninhabited islands of Gulf of Mannar. The island has been continuously making news because about one-fourth area of this island has become submerged due to intensive coral mining activities. The Tamil Nadu government with the help of IIT Madras is trying to restore the island through “artificial reefs”.
